prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon with vibrant colors and intricate wing patterns.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to dance.
Design a playful insect Pokemon that flutters around flowers and collects pollen.
Show me a Pokemon with dazzling wings that can change colors based on seasons.
Generate a cute bug-type Pokemon that has a calming presence and a gentle personality.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a butterfly and has the ability to create gusts of wind.
I want a colorful bug Pokemon that represents the beauty of nature in every form.
